description: Police are involved in a tense stand-off with the man who took about 20 people hostage in Lutsk.
title: Ukraine gunman releases three of his bus hostages in Lutsk
title_page: Ukraine gunman releases three of his bus hostages in Lutsk - BBC News
maintext: He said the hostages, who have been on the bus for several hours, were well and the authorities were doing everything they could to resolve the crisis quickly and peacefully.
